project_abstract.cdata: The Shanghai Sewerage Project is directed toward improving environmental conditions of Shanghai through building a sewerage facilities for the removal and disposal of wastewater, and to create and develop the institutions for providing sewerage services, managing water resources and protecting the environment. In addition, this project provides a model to demonstrate the policies and measures needed to resolve the rapidly growing issue of environmental pollution in China's larger cities.  The project consists of the construction of a link and intercepting sewer system to collect and transport wastewater in the project area to the estuary of the Changjiang for disposal, the assistance to carry out four project related studies and a comprehensive training program. The four studies to be completed involve: management and organization; a sewerage tariff study; a river basin management study; and, an examination of the economic ways of rehabilitating the existing combined sewer system in Shanhai.

P003449.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>上海污水项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）通过建设污水收集和处理设施改善上海市环境状况；（2）建立并完善污水服务提供制度；（3）开展水资源管理并保护环境。本项目为示范解决中国较大城市环境污染日益严重问题所需采取的政策措施提供了典范。项目内容包括：（1）建设污水截流连接管网，用于收集项目区污水并将其输送至长江口处理；（2）协助开展四项同项目相关的研究；（3）提供综合性培训。四项研究包括管理组织研究、污水处理费研究、流域管理研究和上海市现有雨污合流系统低成本改造方法研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
